dialogues.speaker: AND GRABS STACKS OF NEWSPAPERS.
dialogues.text: (NEW MUSIC IN)

dialogues.speaker: GIGI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: You know the expression, "A man's man"? 108.13

dialogues.speaker: GIGI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: A man's man is the leader of the pack. The kind of man other men look up to, admire and emulate.

dialogues.speaker: GIGI V.O.
dialogues.text: A man's man is the kind of man who just doesn't get what women are about.

dialogues.speaker: GIGI
dialogues.text: Nick, my ex-husband, is the ultimate man's man. I probably never should have married him. I don't think he understood a thing about me.

dialogues.speaker: ANNIE
dialogues.text: This is Nick Marshall's office. Want a peek? Don't worry, he never gets in before ten.

dialogues.speaker: ANNIE
dialogues.text: He'll send you on more errands than anyone in the entire company 'cause he can't do anything for himself. He's like this total bachelor and the least politically correct guy in the universe. He's the king of all the T&A adds we do. SHE INDICATES TO PHOTOS ON WALL.

dialogues.speaker: ANNIE
dialogues.text: You want babes in bikinis? He's your man.

dialogues.speaker: MT. GRAPHIC
dialogues.text: and ALAN ALDA 174.15

dialogues.speaker: ALEX
dialogues.text: My dad? How can I best describe him? He's always been...like an uncle to me. Yeah, uncle dad.

dialogues.speaker: GIGI
dialogues.text: Although, Nick was a charmer. Completely irresistible at first...which feeds into the whole "Man's man" thing. You know about Nick's mother, right? SHE GETS UP AND MOVES R ACROSS ROOM.

dialogues.speaker: GIGI
dialogues.text: Because once you understand Nick's mother, you understand Nick.

dialogues.speaker: MT. GRAPHIC
dialogues.text: casting by HOWARD FEUER c.s.a. and DEBORAH AQUILA c.s.a. 217.10

dialogues.speaker: GIGI V.O.
dialogues.text: Nick was actually born and raised in Las Vegas. Nick's mother was a real honest to God Las Vegas showgirl. When other boys were outside riding bikes and playing ball, Nick was backstage hanging with the girls.

dialogues.speaker: GIGI V.O.
dialogues.text: He was their mascot. Their little pet. They couldn't get enough of those baby blues.

dialogues.speaker: MT. GRAPHIC
dialogues.text: music composed and conducted by

dialogues.speaker: MT. GRAPHIC
dialogues.text: music supervisor

dialogues.speaker: MT. GRAPHIC
dialogues.text: costume designer ELLEN MIROJNICK

dialogues.speaker: MT. GRAPHIC
dialogues.text: film editors STEPHEN A ROTTER and

dialogues.speaker: MT. GRAPHIC
dialogues.text: production designer JON HUTMAN

dialogues.speaker: MT. GRAPHIC
dialogues.text: director of photography DEAN CUNDEY a.s.c. 264.14

dialogues.speaker: GIGI V.O.
dialogues.text: If you ask me, Nick's mother just about killed it for every woman Nick would ever meet. She had a lot of sugar daddies in her life, but only one true love. The boy with the family jewels.

dialogues.speaker: MT. GRAPHIC
dialogues.text: co-producer BRUCE A. BLOCK

dialogues.speaker: MT. GRAPHIC
dialogues.text: executive producers STEPHEN McEVEETY DAVID McFADZEAN

dialogues.speaker: MT. GRAPHIC
dialogues.text: produced by

dialogues.speaker: SUSAN CARTSONIS
dialogues.text: and GINA MATTHEWS 292.03

dialogues.speaker: GIGI V.O.
dialogues.text: And since Nick didn't have a father, his mother made sure he was always surrounded by strong male role models.

dialogues.speaker: MANAGER
dialogues.text: Come here.

dialogues.speaker: GIGI V.O.
dialogues.text: Men her little boy could really look up to.

dialogues.speaker: MT. GRAPHIC
dialogues.text: produced by BRUCE DAVEY

dialogues.speaker: MT. GRAPHIC
dialogues.text: story by JOSH GOLDSMITH & CATHY YUSPA and DIANE DRAKE 310.12

dialogues.speaker: MANAGER O.S.
dialogues.text: Now you're ready, huh? 313.05

dialogues.speaker: MANAGER
dialogues.text: Keep counting, kid. Keep counting.

dialogues.speaker: MT. GRAPHIC
dialogues.text: screenplay by

dialogues.speaker: GIGI V.O.
dialogues.text: Make a wish. Make a wish, honey.

dialogues.speaker: GIGI V.O.
dialogues.text: So, what did you expect? You don't have to be Freud to figure out... 330.11 SCENE 18 - MS ON DANCER WITH CAMERA. 332.05

dialogues.speaker: GIGI V.O.
dialogues.text: ...this was one cock-eyed way... 335.09

dialogues.speaker: DANCERS
dialogues.text: Smile!

dialogues.text: Shit! I'm such an idiot. I didn't think he'd be there! 844.15 SCENE 118 - MCU ON NICK.

dialogues.speaker: IN BOOTH CHATTING. WE STAY ON THEM.

dialogues.text: What do you mean, let's meet for a drink?

dialogues.text: Yes. That's exactly what I wanted to say. Sometimes I think you're a bit of a mind reader.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: What, are you kidding? It's a relief. An enormous relief. Do you know how rare that Is, to actually say what you think? 937.09 SCENE 127 - OTS MS ON HER.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: Do you have any idea how rare it is for someone to actually like that about me? Trust me, this has not been a great thing in my life. My ex-husband didn't love me, let's put it that way. 953.08 SCENE 128 - OTS MCU ON NICK.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: He didn't love you? 958.02 SCENE 129 - OTS MCU ON HER HORRIFIED.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: Oh, God! Um...I meant to say, it. He didn't love it. 970.01 SCENE 130 - OTS ON HIM.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: That I spoke my mind. 976.04 SCENE 131 - OTS ON HER.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Ooh.

dialogues.text: Yes, there's a conversation starter. God, a smart person would just get so very drunk now. THEY TOAST. 991.12 SCENE 133 - MS ON BOTH.

dialogues.text: How long were you married? 996.10 SCENE 134 - OTS MS ON HER.

dialogues.text: A little less than a year. I've been divorced about nine months now. We worked together, you know that, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1005.01 SCENE 135 - OTS ON NICK.

dialogues.text: Oh, yeah. I knew that. I heard it.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: Hmm.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: What was that like? 1012.09 SCENE 136 - OTS ON HER.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: It was great in the beginning. 1017.04 SCENE 137 - OTS ON HIM.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: Then it changed, became competitive. 1022.05 SCENE 138 - OTS ON HER.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: Suddenly, the better I did, the worse we did. The price I pay for being me. I know that now.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Oh... 1035.01 SCENE 139 - OTS ON HIM.

dialogues.text: No, no, truly. No, no, it's true. 1039.08 SCENE 140 - OTS MS ON HER.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Keep going. 1052.09 SCENE 141 - OTS MCU ON HIM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1060.12 SCENE 142 - OTS MCU ON HER.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: I mean, not scary, but um...well, yeah, I was kinda scared. 1070.05 SCENE 143 - OTS ON HIM.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Why? 1072.08 SCENE 144 - OTS ON HER.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: I don't know. Guess I wasn't sure I could do the job. I mean, I thought I could do it but I'm finding Sloane Curtis a much tougher place to navigate than I thought. I'm sorry. 1092.01 SCENE 145 - OTS ON HIM.

dialogues.text: This is insensitive of me, I know you...

dialogues.speaker: DARCY

dialogues.text: I'm sorry that I'm the one that got it. 1099.14 SCENE 147 - OTS ON HIM.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I'm not. I'm not. 1104.03 SCENE 148 - OTS ON HER.

dialogues.text: I've learned a lot from you.

dialogues.text: Like what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1109.10 SCENE 149 - OTS ON HIM.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Like what? Well, for starters, you really love what you do. 1113.09 SCENE 150 - OTS ON HER.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: You really love what you do. 1115.13 SCENE 151 - OTS ON HIM.

dialogues.text: It just come out like...

dialogues.text: Really. I think the bloom is definitely off the rose. 1138.06 SCENE 154 - OTS MCU ON HER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1149.03 SCENE 156 - OTS ON HER.

dialogues.text: Finally I own my own place. 1152.09 SCENE 157 - OTS ON HIM. 1156.01 SCENE 158 - OTS ON HER.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: What? Now I wish I was a mind reader. 1161.15 SCENE 159 - OTS ON HIM.

I mean, we have this totally unbelievable, life altering sex, and then you disappear! I mean, you stopped drinking coffee! 49.07 SCENE 4 - OTS BACK ON HIM.

dialogues.text: 110.13 SCENE 14 - MCU ON HIM. LOLA.

dialogues.text: 163.09 SCENE 21 - OTS MFS ON HER.

dialogues.text: This is your lucky day, pal. I just saw the Nike group get off the elevator.  All women. Your specialty. Come on, I'll walk you up.

dialogues.text: I hate what I'm doing to Darcy. I hate it. I'm gonna write her a long letter and confess everything.

dialogues.text: Well, they are.

dialogues.text: What do you mean "They" are? Are you officially a woman now?

dialogues.text: Oh, I wish. A woman wouldn't have screwed over the woman she loved. No, they don't think that way.

dialogues.text: And another thing, you know this whole thing about penis envy?

dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Not true.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: No, they don't envy. Half of them don't even like it. You know who has penis envy? We do. That's why we cheat and screw up and lie, because we're all obsessed with our own equipment, that's why. THEY ARRIVE AT MEETING ROOM. DARCY L GREETS NICK AT DOOR.

dialogues.speaker: NICK O.S.
dialogues.text: Oh, honey. I'm so proud of you. 263.08

dialogues.speaker: ALEX O.S.
dialogues.text: What are you doing!

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Sorry. 267.00

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I'm sorry. But I am. And believe it or not, I know what it's like to be a woman. 278.07 SCENE 23 - MCU ON HER REACTION.

dialogues.speaker: NICK O.S.
dialogues.text: It's not as easy as it looks. 284.13 SCENE 24 - MCU ON NICK.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: But you stood up for yourself. 287.07 SCENE 25 - ON HER.

dialogues.speaker: NICK O.S.
dialogues.text: You know how ahead of the game you are?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 290.11 SCENE 26 - BACK ON HIM.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Anyway, I guy who would treat you like that and talks to you like that, he's not worth... 296.01 SCENE 27 - MCU ON HER.

dialogues.speaker: ALEX
dialogues.text: Worth my time. Yes, I know. 299.13 SCENE 28 - BACK ON HIM.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: It's true. He's not.

dialogues.speaker: ALEX O.S.
dialogues.text: And he's a total game player and I hate that.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: You are so much smarter than me.

dialogues.speaker: AS ALEX APPEARS IN DOORWAY.
dialogues.text: 323.10 SCENE 30 - MCU ON HIS REACTION.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: And look at you. That clown made out with a girl with a tongue ring over you? 335.04 SCENE 31 - MCU ON ALEX. 339.13 SCENE 32 - BACK ON NICK.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Honey, you look beautiful. 347.07 SCENE 33 - BACK ON HER.

dialogues.speaker: ALEX
dialogues.text: Thanks. Take me home, dad. 369.13

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: What am I doing? She's not in the refrigerator.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I wonder if it's too late to go over there. Of course it's not too late. It's never too late to do the right thing. That's what do, I'll go over there and I'll do the right thing. HE MOVES OSR. 492.11

dialogues.speaker: INTO FG TO FRONT DOOR IN BG.
DARCY, (INTO INTER-COM)
dialogues.text: Hello? 511.04

dialogues.speaker: NICK, (INTO INTER-COM)
dialogues.text: Ah...hi, it's me. Well, I'm glad I found you. Ah...can I come up? 522.13

dialogues.speaker: NICK, (OVER INTER-COM)
dialogues.text: Darcy? 527.13

dialogues.speaker: NICK, (INTO INTER-COM)
dialogues.text: I need to... DOOR BUZZES AND HE RUSHES IN OSL. 533.08

dialogues.speaker: DARCY O.S.
dialogues.text: Hey. HE STOPS ON STAIRS LOOKING UP. 539.05 SCENE 42 - MS ON HER AT RAIL.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: You need to what? It's one O'clock in the morning. 542.13

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I need to talk to you. 546.11 SCENE 44 - BACK ON HER.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: Okay.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Thanks. So, you sleep here now?

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: Well, I thought I might as well give it a try before I have to sell the place.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Sell it? You're not selling this place.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: Can't afford to keep it. I don't  have a job. 574.11 SCENE 46 - MCU ON HIM.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: You know, you ought to try returning some of your phone calls. You got your job back. 581.11 SCENE 47 - MCU ON HER.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: Oh, do I? You're a real riot, you know that? 588.03 SCENE 48 - BACK ON NICK.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: It's true. Dan told me so himself. 591.06 SCENE 49 - BACK ON HER.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: Why would he tell you to do that? I didn't do the job that he hired me to do. Even I don't blame him for firing me.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: Look, I'm ah...well come on in. I don't have any chairs, but if you want to...

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: What if I told you that you did everything that you were hired to do, but that someone was sabotaging you. Picking your brain, swiping your ideas and you never even know what hit you.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: How is that possible?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Oh, trust me. It's possible.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: Well, who would do such an awful thing? 642.09 SCENE 51 - OTS MCU ON NICK.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I would. 651.00 SCENE 52 - OTS MCU ON HER REACTION.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I was a dope with... 657.00 SCENE 53 - OTS ON HIM.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: ... a corner office and when you came with the job I was supposed to have, I mean, it didn't matter that you were better at it than me, or you earned it more than I did. As Far as I was concerned, it was mine and I was gonna do anything I could to get it back. And so, I took advantage of you in the worst possible way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 691.05 SCENE 54 - OTS ON HER.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Have you ever done that? 698.02 SCENE 55 - OTS BACK ON HIM.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Taken the wrong road.  No, of course you haven't. You wouldn't do that. It's just somebody like me does that. And ah, the problem with that was, that while I was digging a hole under you... 722.07 SCENE 56 - OTS ON HER.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: ...I found out all about you. 729.00 SCENE 57 - OTS ON NICK.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: And the more I found out, the more you dazzled me. I mean, shook my world, changed my life, dazzled me. And guys like your ex-husband of yours, I mean, he made you feel that the price that you pay for being you, is that you don't get to have love. 764.00 SCENE 58 - OTS ON HER.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Isn't that what you were trying to say the other night? That you weren't complete. That you weren't really a winner like that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 775.04 SCENE 59 - OTS BACK ON NICK.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Everything about you, how smart you are, how good you are, everything just makes me want you even more. Oh, boy. It sort of looks like I'm here at one in the morning being all heroic trying to rescue you, but the truth is, I'm the one that needs to be rescued here. 818.07

dialogues.speaker: SPEECHLESS.
dialogues.text: 827.04 SCENE 61 - OTS BACK ON NICK.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Sure wish I could read your mind . 835.13 SCENE 62 - OTS ON HER.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: Well, I was thinking that um...if everything that you're saying is true, if I have my job back, then I think you're fired. 874.02 SCENE 63 - OTS BACK ON NICK SURPRISED.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Well, I never really thought about it from that angle. Well, not that I don't deserve It. I...I...do. I'm stuttering. 903.06 SCENE 64 - OTS ON HER. 907.05 SCENE 65 - OTS BACK ON HIM WALKING OSL.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Now I feel kind of embarrassed that I told you that I needed to be rescued. That's fine. THEY JUST STARE AT EACH OTHER. 938.02 SCENE 67 - MS ON NICK TURNING TO LEAVE. 942.13

dialogues.speaker: RUSHES OFF DOWN STAIRS IN BG.
dialogues.text: 947.01 SCENE 69 - MS ON HER WATCHING. 950.11

dialogues.speaker: DARCY O.S.
dialogues.text: That's it? HE STOPS AND TURNS BACK TO LOOK. 954.11

dialogues.speaker: TO FG.
dialogues.text: 958.15 SCENE 72 - HER POV ON HIM LOOKING UP.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I don't want that to be it. I don't want that to be it at all. 969.02

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: Then don't let a little thing like me firing you stand in your way. 975.10

dialogues.speaker: TO HER.
dialogues.text: (NEW MUSIC IN)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 978.15 SCENE 75 - MCU ON DARCY.

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: I didn't know what to react to first. Hey, newsflash, I took the wrong road. 993.10

dialogues.speaker: DARCY
dialogues.text: What kind of knight in shining armor would I be if the man I love needs rescuing and I just let him walk out my door? 1011.00

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: My hero. 1031.01

dialogues.speaker: FADE TO BLACK.
dialogues.text: 1058.15 SCENE 80 - CREDITS ROLL. (NEW MUSIC IN)
